title: Intermittent image load
content:
Hi,

I noticed that when I try to load this image : https://sandbox.img.vggcdn.net/img/cat/39265/7/13.jpg

Then sometimes this is working and other times this is not. Especially when I "empty cache and refresh" then i get the error message :

"The image at https://sandbox.img.vggcdn.net/img/cat/39265/7/13.jpg cannot be displayed because it contained errors."

I am on version 97.0.1, Windows 64bit.

Is this a known issue?

title: Use System Deafult Print Dialog box, not the FF Print dialog
content:
Hello, With one of the latest updates, it has wiped out the ability to use the System Default Print Dialog box by default.

I reviewed the settings for: print.tab_modal.enabled Which is still FALSE, but the new FF print dialog persists. (per this article: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1322589. )

I print PDFs constantly and having the secondary step of clicking to use the System Print dialog is very annoying.

How can I get the system default print dialog as the default preference again?

Using MacOS 12.2.1 FF v97.0.1

Thank you!
creator: muzzle

title: TLS connection error
content: I tried to access the pCloud website using Firefox. It was rejected because Firefox could not check the certifcate. The I accessed this site with Opera. It worked. I looked at the certificate using Opera and the result was : certificate delivered by QuoVadis Global SSL ICA G2 Valid from 11/03/2020 to 11/03/2022 The key length is 2048 bits, so it’s a TLS certificate. Problem with Firefox certificates management ?

title: Developer Tools - Debug
content: The java script debugging is not as good as chrome. I was wasting time for a minor issue as the browser doesn't show the exact line which triggers the issue. After finding the issue by debugging manually line by line (dry running code with state inputs), I found the issue and wondered why the exact line is not shown in exception trace in console. Then tried with chrome to check if it can show proper trace and it did. I often push myself to use fire fox instead of chrome to overcome monopoly in the future. But these kind of situations leading to wasting my time makes me run back to chrome.
creator: janakar8t6

title: Unable to launch/uninstall FireFox
content:
Hello Support,

I have encounter a very odd situation where my Firefox wont launch properly where address bar does not work, no content can be display and the page, I have tried: 1. Uninstall (NSIS Error- Error launching installer) 2. Download a new installer from FireFox and install on top if current ver. 97.0.1(64 bits), same behavior just blank screen. 3. Trying to go setting but nothing happened when go three line and settings (the page stay at blank page) 4. I can click + to create new tab but could not switch to it. I have to close current tab and it will automaticlly goes to the next tab (still blank page) 5. Unable to signin to sync data 6. Whenever I launch Firefox, it will always have two task and one of them always not responding and browser become not responding 7. Restart did not solve the problem so does install FireFox on different Winodws profile. 8. About:support could not be display

I would like continue to use FireFox and please help me resolve the issue -Ryan
creator: lee02113

title: Squareup login fields not appearing in Firefox
content:
When I go to https://squareup.com/login the entry fields do not appear in Firefox. It's impossible for me to access my Square account through Firefox currently, which I use for client invoicing. I have no trouble logging in through Chrome. Screenshot attached.

I have Privacy Badger and AdBlock installed for both browsers. I tried disabling them for Firefox just to see if that was the issue, but it made no difference. I am using an iMac running macOS Catalina version 10.15.7. My Firefox Browser is version 97.0.1, and currently shows that it's up to date. My Chrome browser is version 98.0.4758.109, also up to date.
